scripts.db:init: docker run --name pgapi3dao -e POSTGRES_DB=api3dao -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=test -d -p5432:5432 postgres && sleep 3 && yarn prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:restore: docker run --name pgapi3dao -e POSTGRES_DB=api3dao -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=test -d -p5432:5432 postgres && sleep 3 && (cat pgapi3dao.sql.gz | gzip -d - | docker exec -i pgapi3dao psql -U postgres -h 127.0.0.1 -d api3dao)
scripts.db:status: PGPASSWORD=test psql -U postgres -h 127.0.0.1 api3dao -c 'select * from sync_status order by id'
scripts.db:dump: (docker exec -i pgapi3dao pg_dump --clean -U postgres -h 127.0.0.1 api3dao > pgapi3dao.sql) && find . -name pgapi3dao.sql.gz -delete && gzip pgapi3dao.sql
scripts.state:reset: TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.cli.json yarn ts-node cli.ts state reset
scripts.state:update: TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.cli.json yarn ts-node cli.ts state update
scripts.state:unlogged: PGPASSWORD=test psql -U postgres -h 127.0.0.1 api3dao -c 'ALTER TABLE "member_delegations" SET UNLOGGED; ALTER TABLE "member_events" SET UNLOGGED; ALTER TABLE "member_epochs" SET UNLOGGED; ALTER TABLE "voting_event" SET UNLOGGED; ALTER TABLE "voting" SET UNLOGGED; ALTER TABLE "members" SET UNLOGGED; ALTER TABLE "epochs" SET UNLOGGED';
scripts.ens:reset: TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.cli.json yarn ts-node cli.ts ens reset
scripts.ens:import: TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.cli.json yarn ts-node cli.ts ens import
scripts.ens:download: API3TRACKER_ENDPOINT=${API3TRACKER_ENDPOINT:-`chainstate --endpoints -t alchemy,mainnet`} TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.cli.json yarn ts-node cli.ts ens download
scripts.logs:reset: TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.cli.json yarn ts-node cli.ts logs reset
scripts.logs:download: API3TRACKER_ENDPOINT=${API3TRACKER_ENDPOINT:-`chainstate --endpoints -t alchemy,mainnet`} TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.cli.json yarn ts-node cli.ts logs download
scripts.supply:reset: TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.cli.json yarn ts-node cli.ts supply reset
scripts.supply:download: API3TRACKER_ENDPOINT=${API3TRACKER_ENDPOINT:-`chainstate --endpoints -t alchemy,mainnet`} TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.cli.json yarn ts-node cli.ts supply download
scripts.treasuries:reset: TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.cli.json yarn ts-node cli.ts treasuries reset
scripts.treasuries:download: API3TRACKER_ENDPOINT=${API3TRACKER_ENDPOINT:-`chainstate --endpoints -t alchemy,mainnet`} TS_NODE_PROJECT=./tsconfig.cli.json yarn ts-node cli.ts treasuries download
scripts.rm-dev: cat package.json | grep -v story | grep -v prettier > package.backup.json && mv package.backup.json package.json
